p: The administrations of A. aspera (Aa) leaves, R. abyssinicus (Ra) rhizomes, S. punctata (Sp) aerial parts, C. murale (Cm) leaves and A. pulcherrima (Ap) gel extracts in rats did not show mortality at fixed dose 2000 mg/kg body weight. Moreover, there were no visible signs of acute toxicity, i.e., food and water consumptions were unaffected; and salivation, aggression, rising furs, and writhing were not observed for 14 days.
